data.text: Mawu, ɖem,
Meɖo ba yi ɖe tome ke,
Medo ɣli be woaxɔ nam,
Ame siwo lé fum ɖe nanekemawɔmawɔ ta la
O! Mawu, ènya nye bometsitsi,
O! Aƒetɔ, Yehowa Ŋusẽkatãtɔ,
Tawòe wodo vlom ɖo,
Menye amedzro na nye ŋutɔ nɔvinye ŋutsuwo
Elabena lɔlɔ̃ na wò aƒe zu dzo ge ɖe menye,
Esi mefa avi, tsi nu dɔ la,
esi meta akpanya la,
Ame siwo nɔ anyi ɖe agbo nu la ɖe alɔme le ŋunye,
O! Yehowa, medo gbe ɖa na wò le wò amenuveɣi;
Ɖem tso agbi me,
Mègana tsi naɖɔ to tanye,
O! Yehowa, tɔ nam, le wò lɔlɔ̃ deto la ta,
Mègaɣla wò mo ɖe wò dɔla o;
Te ɖe ŋunye, eye nàxɔ nam,
Ènya ale si wodo vlom,
Vlododo na nye dzi gbã,
Wotsɔ veve de nye nuɖuɖu me,
Woƒe kplɔ̃ si woɖo na wo la nezu mɔ na wo;
Woƒe ŋkuwo dzi nedo viviti be,
Trɔ wò dziku kɔ ɖe wo dzi,
Woƒe nɔƒe neɖi gbɔlo;
Elabena woti ame siwo ŋu nède abii la yome,
Bu fɔ wo, eye nàgabu fɔ wo ɖe edzi;
Tutu woƒe ŋkɔwo ɖa le agbegbalẽ la me,
Mele vevesese kple nuxaxa me;
Matsɔ hadzidzi akafu Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ,
Esia adze Yehowa ŋu wu nyi,
Hiãtɔwo akpɔe ahatso aseye,
Yehowa ɖoa to hiãtɔwo,
Dziƒo kple anyigba nekafui,
elabena Mawu aɖe Zion,
eƒe dɔlawo ƒe viwo atsɔe anyi domee,
